process_name: Simulate a Fair Coin Toss With a Biased Coin - Steps
step_1: Find any coin
step_2: Designate one outcome heads
step_3: Designate another outcome tails
step_4: Flip the coin twice
step_5: If both tosses gave the same outcome, or if either toss landed on its edge or did something else not accounted for in steps 2 and 3, don't count either toss and redo step 4
step_6: If you got heads before tails, count it as heads
